action.primary: Dispels Wind-Dampness and strengthens the sinews and bones

indications: Wind-Cold-Damp Bi with pain spasms or numbness (superficial or deep)
Weakness or softness in the sinews or bones
Pain and swelling due to traumatic injury

contraindications: Use caution for those with Yin Deficiency Heat.
It may cause toxic side effects.

useCases: Joint pain, lower back pain, muscle spasms and numbness of the ex-tremities, especially in the elderly
As a medicinal wine for joint pain, lower back pain, muscle spasms and numbness in the elderly

notes: It is widely used to treat the elderly, internally and topically.
This herb unblocks channels, reduces swelling, warms the Stomach and alleviates pain.
This herb enters the Blood level.
Because of its strong fortifying action, this herb is suitable for weakness or softness in the sinews or bones.
It can be used for abscess, sores and epigastric pain due to Cold.
